mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Established in 1857, Llewellyn Park is listed in the National and State Historic Registers as both the first romantically landscaped and one of the first planned luxury estate communities in America." --http://www.llewellynpark.com/page/13266~93842/Highlights House built for Thomas Caldecot Chubb [Chubb Group], who with his son Percy Chubb founded a predecessor firm, Chubb & Son, in 1882. -- http://www.nytimes.com/1987/07/12/style/sarah-chubb-has-wedding.html [work]
